ygData.subject: RE: Gypsy Lute - who's who?
ygData.msgSnippet: you re correct on both accounts John. Shada ... -- John H. Kim kim@stormhaven.org
ygData.messageBody:
you're correct on both accounts John.

Shada

> The Lute of the Gypsy Princess used to be used in a Grimrot
> quest for the Wakizashi. That quest has since been changed,
> and the LotGP has no currently known purpose. As of latest
> report (about 3 weeks ago I believe) it does not enhance any
> of your songs. It comes from the named gypsy - Mythani
> Dvissi or something like that.
>
> A Gypsy Lute is needed for the lambent breastplate quest. It
> is +5 magic resist and works like a normal lute. It is
> NO-DROP - you will have to loot it yourself from a generic
> gypsy musician.
>
> All this is hearsay. I have never seen either of these items.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
